download.desc: Ollama is currently downloading the model. Please try not to close this page. It will resume from where it left off if you restart the download.
download.title: Downloading model {{model}}

plugin.empty: No installed plugins yet, feel free to explore the <1>Plugin Store</1>

settings.hint: Please fill in the following configurations based on the description
settings.title: {{id}} Plugin Configuration

autoCreateTopicThreshold.desc: Automatically create a topic when the current message count exceeds this value
autoCreateTopicThreshold.title: Message Threshold

compressThreshold.desc: When the uncompressed history messages exceed this value, compression will be applied
compressThreshold.title: History Message Length Compression Threshold

enableAutoCreateTopic.desc: Whether to automatically create a topic during the conversation, only effective in temporary topics
enableAutoCreateTopic.title: Auto Create Topic

enableCompressThreshold.title: Enable History Message Length Compression Threshold

historyCount.desc: Number of historical messages carried with each request
historyCount.title: Attached History Message Count

inputTemplate.desc: The user's latest message will be filled into this template
inputTemplate.placeholder: Preprocessing template {{text}} will be replaced with real-time input information
inputTemplate.title: User Input Preprocessing

frequencyPenalty.desc: The higher the value, the more likely it is to reduce repeated words
frequencyPenalty.title: Frequency Penalty

maxTokens.desc: The maximum number of tokens used for each interaction
maxTokens.title: Max Tokens Limit

presencePenalty.desc: The higher the value, the more likely it is to expand to new topics
presencePenalty.title: Topic Freshness

temperature.desc: The higher the value, the more random the response
temperature.title: Randomness

topP.desc: Similar to randomness, but do not change together with randomness
topP.title: Top P Sampling

accessCode.desc: Encryption access is enabled by the administrator
accessCode.title: Access Password

signin.desc: Sign in using SSO to unlock the app
signin.title: Sign In to Your Account

showAllLocaleVoice.desc: If closed, only voices in the current language will be displayed
showAllLocaleVoice.title: Show All Locale Voices

sttAutoStop.desc: When closed, speech recognition will not end automatically and requires manual click to stop
sttAutoStop.title: Auto Stop Speech Recognition

sttLocale.desc: The language of the speech input, this option can improve the accuracy of speech recognition
sttLocale.title: Speech Recognition Language

sttService.desc: Where 'browser' is the native speech recognition service of the browser
sttService.title: Speech Recognition Service

ttsService.desc: If using OpenAI text-to-speech service, make sure the OpenAI model service is enabled
ttsService.title: Text-to-Speech Service

voice.desc: Select a voice for the current agent, different TTS services support different voices
voice.title: Text-to-Speech Voice

neutralColor.desc: Custom neutral color for different color tendencies
neutralColor.title: Neutral Color

submitAgentModal.metaMiss: Please complete the agent information before submitting. It should include name, description, and tags
submitAgentModal.placeholder: Enter a unique identifier for the agent, e.g. web-development

deviceName.hint: Add a name for easy identification
deviceName.title: Device Name

warning.message: This feature is currently experimental and may have unexpected or unstable behavior. If you encounter any issues, please submit feedback promptly.

channelName.desc: WebRTC will use this name to create a sync channel. Ensure the channel name is unique.
channelName.title: Sync Channel Name

channelPassword.desc: Add a password to ensure channel privacy. Only devices with the correct password can join the channel.
channelPassword.title: Sync Channel Password

webrtc.desc: Real-time, peer-to-peer data communication requires all devices to be online for synchronization.

enabled.invalid: Please enter a sync channel name before enabling
enabled.title: Enable Sync

webrtc.title: WebRTC Sync

tools.disabled: The current model does not support function calls and cannot use the plugin
tools.title: Extension Tools
